Paralytic_poison.DESCRIPTION: Reduce strength and dexterity for each stack. Increase stack by 1 each turn. Increase poison decay by stacks / 2 rounded down.

trigger.DESCRIPTION: Cause the specified powers to immediately apply their effect and decay.

piercing.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage while ignoring enemy block and your strength.

acid.DESCRIPTION: Remove block at end of targets turn.

redemption.DESCRIPTION: Remove hp at start of targets turn.

effective_heal.DESCRIPTION: The amount of missing health restored, any heal beyond maxHp is ignored.

modify.DESCRIPTION: Change behavior of another debuff. Modification will be removed if modified power is removed.

virtue.DESCRIPTION: Has no effect alone. Some cards use it to empower their effects.

sin.DESCRIPTION: Has no effect alone. Some cards use it to empower their effects.

bleed.DESCRIPTION: At end of targets turn, a third of bleed (rounded up) and that much hp is lost.

infection.DESCRIPTION: When attacking, reduce damage by up to infection amount. at end of turn, lose infection equal to power of highest attack reduced
